title: 41% of Central Banks Expect to Have Operational CBDCs by 2028 — Study
description: Some 41% of central banks that participated in the Official Monetary and Financial Institutions Forum (OMFIF) study said they expect to have an operational central bank digital currency (CBDC) by 2028. The survey found that the sentiment towards CBDCs is turning positive with 30% of the respondents having become more inclined to issue a digital […]

title: Diablo 4 Campaign Length and Gameplay Dynamics
description: Diablo 4, the latest installment in Blizzard’s iconic series, distinguishes itself with an expansive campaign marked by elaborate cut scenes and compelling characters. Early reviews of the main story have been notably positive, showcasing the game’s immersive narrative. The main campaign of Diablo 4 spans approximately 35 hours, introducing players to six acts. title: Eurogamer’s Contributors Share Their Top Games of 2023
description: Eurogamer, one of the leading voices in video game journalism, has provided a personal touch to their year-end game recommendations. Instead of the usual top 50 lists, several contributors have shared their top five, offering insights into their favorite games of 2023. title: APECOIN PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (December 26) – Ape Surges 5% Today Amid Latest Recovery
description: After doubling its price in two months, Apecoin retraced briefly this month and found support above the $1.5 level. title: Shiba Inu Burn Rate Skyrockets 161,540%- What’s Next for SHIB Price?
description: Shiba Inu’s value surged over 35% monthly, boosted by a massive burn rate of 8.59 billion SHIB tokens in 24 hours. Notable burn transactions included one for 8.53 billion SHIB tokens, increasing investor optimism and reducing immediate selling pressure. title: Spot Bitcoin ETF Surge Set to Eclipse $50 Billion Crypto ETP Market
description:
BitMEX Research’s recent data reveals a burgeoning crypto exchange-traded product (ETP) market, currently featuring around 150 products with up to $50.3 billion in assets under management. This market, primarily comprising spot and futures funds, predominantly tracks the performance of leading cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum.  With the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) potentially greenlighting […]
